means: 无风的，平稳的，喘不过气的

sentence.Network_en: The whole windless place smelt sour and ammoniac.
sentence.Network_cn: 没有一丝风,整个这块地方弥漫着酸臭和阿摩尼亚味道.

sentence.Network_en: The bullhorn acacia is not a tree of the dark windless depths of the tropical rain - forest.
sentence.Network_cn: 牛角相思树不喜欢在阴暗不透风茂密的热带林区中生长.

sentence.Network_en: He prefers windless days for playing golf.
sentence.Network_cn: 他喜欢在无风的日子里打高尔夫球.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 有什么以less结尾的单词么..？_百度知道 ... wigless 未戴假发的 windless 无风的 winless 没有过一次胜利的.
But even on windless days the air always smelt of something under sulphurcoal , or acid., 甚至无风的时候 , 空气里也带着一种地窖下的什么恶味.

windless weather and favorable tides were required for the landing operations .无风的天气和有利的潮汐是登陆行动所必须的。

entry.def: If the air is windless, or if it is a windless day, it is very calm and still.

sentences.sentence: "he prefers windless days for playing golf"

auth_sentence.content: How will we run our factories and air conditioners on a windless night?
auth_sentence.res_content: How will we run our factories and air conditioners on a windless night?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How will we run our factories and air conditioners on a windless night?

auth_sentence.content: Energy storage - how do you effectively store the energy in your house, or neighborhood for the overcast, windless day.
auth_sentence.res_content: Energy storage - how do you effectively store the energy in your house, or neighborhood for the overcast, windless day.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Energy storage - how do you effectively store the energy in your house, or neighborhood for the overcast, windless day.

auth_sentence.content: Renewables are a waste of money, since you anyway have to build a backup to fill in for night times and windless days.
auth_sentence.res_content: Renewables are a waste of money, since you anyway have to build a backup to fill in for night times and windless days.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Renewables are a waste of money, since you anyway have to build a backup to fill in for night times and windless days.
